name: Improvised Rope
instructions: Tear 12 Rags from clothing items or find them. Combine the 6 Rags in your inventory to craft an Improvised Rope.

name: Improvised Rope
instructions: Use a Knife on a Pile of Guts to craft an Improvised Rope.

name: Short Stick
instructions: Use a Knife on a Long Wooden Stick to cut it down into a Short Stick.

name: Short Stick
instructions: Use a Hatchet on Firewood to create a Short Stick.

name: Plank
instructions: Use a Hacksaw on a Lumber Pile to craft a Plank.

name: Plank
instructions: Use a Hacksaw on a Wooden Log to craft a Plank.

name: Burlap Strips
instructions: Use a Knife on a Burlap Sack to cut it into Burlap Strips.

name: Assault Helmet with Visor
instructions: Attach an Assault Helmet Visor to an Assault Helmet in your inventory to craft the Assault Helmet with Visor.

name: Assault Vest Buttpack Attached
instructions: Combine an Assault Vest with a Utility Buttpack in your inventory to craft an Assault Vest with Buttpack.

name: Ghillie Hood
instructions: Combine 2 Burlap Strips with 1 Netting in your inventory to craft a Ghillie Hood.

name: Ghillie Bushrag
instructions: Combine 4 Burlap Strips with 2 Netting in your inventory to craft a Ghillie Bushrag.

name: Plate Carrier w/ Pouches
instructions: Attach Pouches to a Plate Carrier in your inventory to craft a Plate Carrier with Pouches.

name: Ghillie Suit
instructions: Combine 10 Burlap Strips with 4 Netting in your inventory to craft a Ghillie Suit.

name: Ghillie Top
instructions: Combine 6 Burlap Strips with 3 Netting in your inventory to craft a Ghillie Top.

name: Plate Carrier w/ Pouches and Gun Holster
instructions: Attach a Gun Holster to a Plate Carrier with Pouches in your inventory to craft the full Plate Carrier Setup.

name: Ghillie Rifle Wrap
instructions: Combine 2 Burlap Strips with 1 Netting in your inventory to craft a Ghillie Rifle Wrap.

name: Armband (Color)
instructions: Use a Knife on a Raincoat to craft a Color Armband.

name: Armband (White)
instructions: Use a Knife on Rags to craft a White Armband.

name: Improvised Courier Bag
instructions: Combine a Burlap Sack with Rope in your inventory to craft an Improvised Courier Bag.

name: Improvised Backpack
instructions: Combine an Improvised Courier Bag with 3 Wooden Sticks in your inventory to craft an Improvised Backpack.

name: Rags
instructions: Use a Knife on a Shirt to tear it into Rags.

name: IV Saline Bag
instructions: Combine a Saline Bag with an IV Start Kit in your inventory to craft an IV Saline Bag.

name: IV Blood Bag
instructions: Combine a Blood Collection Kit with an IV Start Kit in your inventory to craft an IV Blood Bag.

name: BK-18 Sawed-Off
instructions: Use a Hacksaw on a BK-18 rifle to saw it off into a BK-18 Sawed-Off.

name: BK-43 Sawed-Off
instructions: Use a Hacksaw on a BK-43 rifle to saw it off into a BK-43 Sawed-Off.

name: Mosin 91/30 Sawed-Off
instructions: Use a Hacksaw on a Mosin 91/30 rifle to saw it off into a Mosin 91/30 Sawed-Off.

name: Nailed Baseball Bat
instructions: Attach 13 Nails to a Baseball Bat in your inventory to craft a Nailed Baseball Bat.

name: Improvised Suppressor
instructions: Combine a Plastic Bottle with Duct Tape in your inventory to craft an Improvised Suppressor.

name: Tarp Shelter
instructions: Combine 4 Long Wooden Sticks with 4 Tarps in your inventory to craft a Tarp Shelter.

name: Shelter Kit
instructions: Combine 1 Rope with 4 Wooden Sticks in your inventory to craft a Shelter Kit.

name: Watchtower Kit
instructions: Combine 1 Rope with 4 Wooden Sticks in your inventory to craft a Watchtower Kit.

name: Fence Kit
instructions: Combine 1 Rope with 2 Wooden Sticks in your inventory to craft a Fence Kit.

name: Flag Pole Kit
instructions: Combine 1 Rope with 4 Wooden Sticks in your inventory to craft a Flag Pole Kit.

name: Wooden Crate
instructions: Combine 8 Planks with 16 Nails in your inventory to craft a Wooden Crate.

name: Fire Barrel
instructions: Use a Knife on an Oil Barrel to craft a Fire Barrel.

name: Fireplace

ingredients.item: Rag or Bandage or Paper or Oak Bark or Firewood Bark

instructions: Combine a Short Stick with one of the following: Rag, Bandage, Paper, Oak Bark, or Firewood Bark to craft a Fireplace.

name: Fireplace with Stone Ring
instructions: Combine a Fireplace Kit with a Stone in your inventory to craft a Fireplace with Stone Ring.

name: Hand Drill Kit
instructions: Combine Oak Bark or Light Bark with a Short Stick in your inventory to craft a Hand Drill Kit.

name: Fireplace (Advanced)
instructions: Combine a Fireplace with a Stone in your inventory to upgrade it to an Advanced Fireplace.

name: Torch

ingredients.item: Short Stick or Long Wooden Stick

instructions: Combine a Short or Long Wooden Stick with a Rag or Fat in your inventory to craft a Torch.

name: Gas Stove
instructions: Combine a Gas Canister with a Gas Stove in your inventory to assemble the Gas Stove.

name: Gas Lamp
instructions: Combine a Gas Canister with a Gas Lamp in your inventory to assemble the Gas Lamp.

name: Stone Knife
instructions: Combine two Small Stones in your inventory to craft a Stone Knife.

name: Small Stone
instructions: Use a Pickaxe on a Stone to craft a Small Stone.

name: Fertilizer (Garden Lime)
instructions: Combine small amounts (0.1) of Guts and Plant Material in your inventory to craft Fertilizer (Garden Lime).
